thread.title: BRIEF-Sears Says Q4 Sales Fell 19 Pct To $395.8 Mln

title: BRIEF-Sears Says Q4 Sales Fell 19 Pct To $395.8 Mln

organizations.name: sears hometown and outlet stores inc

text:
April 19, 2018 / 9:06 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Sears Says Q4 Sales Fell 19 Pct To $395.8 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Sears Hometown and Outlet Stores Inc : 
* SEARS HOMETOWN AND OUTLET STORES, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES ANNUAL MEETING DATE * Q4 SALES FELL 19 PERCENT TO $395.8 MILLION 
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE DECREASED $0.56 TO $1.46 LOSS PER SHARE FROM $2.02 LOSS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
